item.title: Aft Cargo A/C Underfloor Heat Control Switch – (32°F Switch)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided AFT CARGO HT remains OFF during cargo conditioning operations.

numlitem.para: Carriage of animals and perishables in associated cargo compartment is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard AFT CARGO Heat switch "LEAVE OFF". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
